content.description: Researchers are investigating how the amount of monthly rainfall, measured in centimeters (<math alttext="c m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>), affects the monthly growth, in <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, of a certain plant. From a sample of data, the researchers created a least-squares regression line. Computer output is shown in the following table.
content.question: Variable <math alttext="D F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="bold"><mrow><mtext>DF</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Estimate <math alttext="S E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="bold"><mrow><mtext>SE</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="bold"><mrow><mtext>T</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Intercept 1 0.75 0.350 2.14 Rainfall 1 0.15 0.025 6.00 Which of the following statements is an interpretation of the value 0.75 shown in the table?

choices.label: Monthly growth is expected to increase by 0.75 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> when rainfall increases by 1 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

Rainfall is expected to increase by 0.75 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> when monthly growth increases by 1 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

For a month with 0 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of rainfall, the monthly growth is expected to be approximately 0.75 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

For a plant with 0 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of monthly growth, the month had an expected rainfall of approximately 0.75 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Approximately 75% of the variability in monthly growth is due to its linear relationship with rainfall.

content.answer: For a month with 0 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of rainfall, the monthly growth is expected to be approximately 0.75 <math alttext="centimeter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
